LevelUpStat - Enum Class in model
Represents the champion stat that the player has selected to level up for a champion.
LevelUpView - Class in views
Static class which handles showing the level up dialogue for a champion and communicating the chosen stat to level up to the game manager

The number of fillers to print for a full line.
